A

athenticate(String, String) - Method in class com.rivieracode.realm.Realm
Delegates authentication to local bean defined by the additional property LOCAL_BEAN_JNDI.
authenticate(Properties, String, String) - Method in interface com.rivieracode.realm.RealmDelegate
Performs custom authentication (DB, LDAP, File, ...).
authenticateUser() - Method in class com.rivieracode.realm.LoginModule
Authenticates the user when called by the container.

C

com.rivieracode.realm - package com.rivieracode.realm
RiveraRealm.Lib targets Glassfish application server to extend easily Java Authentication and Authorization Service (JAAS).

G

getAuthType() - Method in class com.rivieracode.realm.Realm
Name and description of the realm.
getGroupNames(String) - Method in class com.rivieracode.realm.Realm
Gets the authorization by accessing local bean defined by the additional property LOCAL_BEAN_JNDI.
getGroupNames(Properties, String) - Method in interface com.rivieracode.realm.RealmDelegate
Provides the groups for the user as configured in the web.xml of the client project.
getJAASContext() - Method in class com.rivieracode.realm.Realm
JAAS Context used to link the LoginModule and the Realm in the container configuration.
getLocalBean() - Method in class com.rivieracode.realm.Realm

I

init(Properties) - Method in class com.rivieracode.realm.Realm
Reserved.

J

JAAS_CONTEXT_PROPERTY - Static variable in class com.rivieracode.realm.Realm
JAAS_CONTEXT : property used in the login.conf to link the LoginModule and the realm (default : RivieraRealmContext)

L

LOCAL_BEAN_JNDI_PROPERTY - Static variable in class com.rivieracode.realm.Realm
LOCAL_BEAN_JNDI : name space of the delegated local bean implementing RealmDelegate (default : java:global/RiveraRealmDB/DelegatedBean)
LoginModule - Class in com.rivieracode.realm
Implements a Glassfish specific JAAS authentication module as defined: Oracle Creating a Custom Realm.
LoginModule() - Constructor for class com.rivieracode.realm.LoginModule
 

R

Realm - Class in com.rivieracode.realm
Configures the application server to delegate authentication and authorization to the local EJB.
Realm() - Constructor for class com.rivieracode.realm.Realm
 
REALM_NAME_PROPERTY - Static variable in class com.rivieracode.realm.Realm
REALM_NAME : name and description of the type of authentication supported (default : RiveraRealm)
RealmDelegate - Interface in com.rivieracode.realm
The Local EJB implements this interface to process authentication and authorization.
